traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the clubneck moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits with its beak on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The clubneck makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
